description:
Sayuri means to reveal her connection to Kaori, but they have to free themselves from their kidnappers first.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 20 Nenme no Saiaki! Saeba-san Imouto o Yoroshiku (Kouhen)
20年目の再会! 冴羽さん妹をよろしく (後編)
Reunion After Twenty Years! Please Look After My Sister, Mr. Saeba (Part 2)
